nombreInsulte: Number of insults in the show: {nombreInsulte}
questionSuppression: Are you sure you want to remove the restaurant
validationNom: The name must be between 2 and 100 characters
valdiationEmplacement: The location must be between 10 and 200 characters
validationDescription: The description must be less than 250 characters and must start with a capital letter and end with a period
validationCommentaire: The comment must be less than 500 characters and if you want to write a number, write it in letters!
validationNote: The score must be between 1 and 10
validationNombreInsulte: The number of insults must be higher than 0
